name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在以人因觀點，探討智慧生活之產品與服務。授課主要以個案探討方式，使學生了解人因相關概念與方法，特別是使用者經驗與人本設計，以及如何將這些概念與方法導入組織中，並應用於相關產品與服務之開發與設計。
schedule:
Week 01 (9/13): Module 1-Introduction
Week 02 (9/20): Module 1-Lecture: Human factors
Week 03 (9/27): Module 1-Lecture: User experience
Week 04 (10/4): Module 2-Persona: Lecture
Week 05 (10/11): Module 2-Persona: Case reading & discussion
Week 06 (10/18): Module 2-Persona: Practice & presentation
Week 07 (10/25): Module 3-Card sorting: Lecture
Week 08 (11/1): Module 3-Card sorting: Case reading & discussion
Week 09 (11/8): Module 3-Card sorting: Practice & presentation
Week 10 (11/15): Module 4-Usability testing: Lecture
Week 11 (11/22): Module 4-Usability testing: Case reading & discussion
Week 12 (11/29): Module 4-Usability testing: Practice & presentation
materials:
1. 自製教材
2. User-Centered Design Stories: Real-World UCD Case Studies (2007), edited by Carol Righi and Janice James, Morgan Kaufmann.
